verses.text: \w After|strong="H1961"\w* some \w time|strong="H1961"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Amnon \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* love \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* sister \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Absalom.

Amnon \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* frustration \w over|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* sister \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* implausible \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w anything|strong="H3972"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w*.

Now Amnon \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w*, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w brother|strong="H7453"\w* \w Shimeah|strong="H8093"\w*.\f + \fr 13:3 \ft Shimeah is a variant of Shammah, Shimea, and Shimei; see 1 Samuel 16:9, 1 Chronicles 2:13, and 2 Samuel 21:21.\f* \w Jonadab|strong="H3122"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w shrewd|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*,

\w so|strong="H3602"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* asked Amnon, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*, \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w so|strong="H3602"\w* \w depressed|strong="H1800"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w after|strong="H1242"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*? Won’t \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*?” Amnon replied, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w in|strong="H4428"\w* love \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*, \w my|strong="H5046"\w* brother Absalom’s sister.”

\w Jonadab|strong="H3082"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w pretend|strong="H2470"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w ill|strong="H2470"\w*. \w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* father comes \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, say \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, ‘\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* sister \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w give|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w something|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w eat|strong="H1262"\w*. \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w watch|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w eat|strong="H1262"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.’”

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* Amnon \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* feigned illness. \w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, Amnon said, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* sister \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w couple|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w cakes|strong="H3834"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w so|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w eat|strong="H1262"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* word \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*: “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Amnon \w your|strong="H6213"\w* brother \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* meal \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* brother Amnon, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*. \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* some \w dough|strong="H1217"\w*, \w kneaded|strong="H3888"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w made|strong="H3947"\w* \w cakes|strong="H3834"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w baked|strong="H1310"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pan|strong="H4958"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w set|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w but|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* eat. “\w Send|strong="H3318"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*!” \w said|strong="H3318"\w* Amnon. \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Amnon said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*, “\w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w food|strong="H1279"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w bedroom|strong="H2315"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w eat|strong="H1262"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.” \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w cakes|strong="H3834"\w* she \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w went|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* brother Amnon’s \w bedroom|strong="H2315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2388"\w* \w when|strong="H7901"\w* \w she|strong="H5973"\w* had \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* \w them|strong="H2388"\w* \w to|strong="H5066"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H5066"\w* eat, he \w took|strong="H2388"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H2388"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w* \w and|strong="H2388"\w* said, “\w Come|strong="H5066"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w my|strong="H2388"\w* sister!”

“\w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H6213"\w* brother!” \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w cried|strong="H3478"\w*. “\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w humiliate|strong="H6031"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w such|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H5039"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w disgraceful|strong="H5039"\w* \w thing|strong="H5039"\w*!

\w Where|strong="H4480"\w* could \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w shame|strong="H2781"\w*? \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fools|strong="H5036"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*! \w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w withhold|strong="H4513"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* Amnon \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H6031"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* being \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w violated|strong="H6031"\w* \w her|strong="H6031"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w her|strong="H6031"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* Amnon \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* Tamar \w with|strong="H3212"\w* such intensity \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w hatred|strong="H8135"\w* \w was|strong="H3966"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w than|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* love \w he|strong="H3588"\w* previously \w had|strong="H3588"\w*. “\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*!” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w her|strong="H8130"\w*. “\w Be|strong="H8130"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*!”

“\w No|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w she|strong="H2063"\w* replied, “\w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w is|strong="H7451"\w* \w worse|strong="H7451"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* already \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*!” \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w refused|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Instead|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w attendant|strong="H8334"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Throw|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* woman \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w bolt|strong="H5274"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w behind|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w*!”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* Amnon’s \w attendant|strong="H8334"\w* threw \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w bolted|strong="H5274"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w behind|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* Tamar \w was|strong="H4428"\w* wearing \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* many colors,\f + \fr 13:18 \ft Or a robe with long sleeves; see also Genesis 37:3.\f* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w wore|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* ashes \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w robe|strong="H3801"\w*. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w putting|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w crying|strong="H2199"\w* bitterly.

\w Her|strong="H7896"\w* brother Absalom \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H7896"\w*, “\w Has|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* brother Amnon \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*? \w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w quiet|strong="H2790"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* sister. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* brother. \w Do|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.” \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8076"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H7896"\w* brother Absalom.

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w furious|strong="H2734"\w*.\f + \fr 13:21 \ft DSS and LXX include But he would not punish his son Amnon, because he loved him, since he was his firstborn.\f*

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* Absalom \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Amnon, \w either|strong="H1697"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* Amnon \w for|strong="H3588"\w* disgracing \w his|strong="H5921"\w* sister \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w*. Absalom’s Revenge on Amnon

Two \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Absalom’s \w sheepshearers|strong="H1494"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w Baal-hazor|strong="H1178"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* Ephraim, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H4428"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* said, “\w Your|strong="H4994"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* just hired \w shearers|strong="H1494"\w*. \w Will|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H1494"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*?”

“\w No|strong="H3808"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,” \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* replied, “\w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burden|strong="H3513"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.” \w Although|strong="H3808"\w* Absalom \w urged|strong="H6555"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* willing \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* gave \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w*.

“If \w not|strong="H3808"\w*,” said Absalom, “\w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* brother Amnon \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*.” “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*?” \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*.
